datasets.name: f532e50c
datasets.displayName: Agg_1: Transactions, sales and quantity sold by store and month for 2023
queryLines:
SELECT 
  store_name,
  product_detail,
  make_date(year(transaction_date), month(transaction_date), day(transaction_date)) AS month_day,
  SUM(transaction_id) AS total_transactions,
  ROUND(sum(transation_total),2) AS total_sales,
  SUM(transaction_qty) AS total_quantity_sold
FROM 
  fct_coffee_shop_transactions
LEFT JOIN dim_coffee_shop_stores 
  ON fct_coffee_shop_transactions.store_id = dim_coffee_shop_stores.store_id
LEFT JOIN dim_coffee_products 
  ON fct_coffee_shop_transactions.product_id = dim_coffee_products.product_id
WHERE
  YEAR(transaction_date) = 2023
GROUP BY 
  store_name,
  product_detail,
  month_day
ORDER BY 
  store_name,
  month_day

datasets.name: 9a274e21
queryLines:
SELECT
  product_detail,
  SUM(transaction_qty) AS total_quantity_sold
FROM
  fct_coffee_shop_transactions AS transactions
LEFT JOIN dim_coffee_products AS products 
  ON transactions.product_id = products.product_id
GROUP BY
  product_detail
ORDER BY
 total_quantity_sold DESC
 limit 10

datasets.name: a98de72d
datasets.displayName: Agg_3: Transactions and total sales per hour
queryLines:
SELECT
  store_name,
  HOUR(transaction_time) AS hour_of_day,
  SUM(transaction_qty) AS total_transactions_per_hour,
  ROUND(SUM(transation_total),2) AS total_store_sales_per_hour
FROM
  fct_coffee_shop_transactions AS transactions
LEFT JOIN dim_coffee_shop_stores AS stores
  ON transactions.store_id = stores.store_id 
GROUP BY
  HOUR(transaction_time), store_name
ORDER BY
 store_name, hour_of_day ASC

datasets.name: 4c4d5dbf
datasets.displayName: Agg_1: Transactions, sales and quantity sold by store and month for 2023 (Forecasted)
queryLines:
WITH original_table AS (
    SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC("WEEK", `month_day`) AS month_day,
  AVG(`total_sales`) AS total_sales
FROM (
    SELECT 
  store_name,
  product_detail,
  make_date(year(transaction_date), month(transaction_date), day(transaction_date)) AS month_day,
  SUM(transaction_id) AS total_transactions,
  ROUND(sum(transation_total),2) AS total_sales,
  SUM(transaction_qty) AS total_quantity_sold
FROM 
  fct_coffee_shop_transactions
LEFT JOIN dim_coffee_shop_stores 
  ON fct_coffee_shop_transactions.store_id = dim_coffee_shop_stores.store_id
LEFT JOIN dim_coffee_products 
  ON fct_coffee_shop_transactions.product_id = dim_coffee_products.product_id
WHERE
  YEAR(transaction_date) = 2023
GROUP BY 
  store_name,
  product_detail,
  month_day
ORDER BY 
  store_name,
  month_day
) GROUP BY 1
  ),
  dates AS (
    SELECT 
      MAX(month_day) AS max_date_column,
      MIN(month_day) AS min_date_column,
      MAX_BY(total_sales, month_day) AS total_sales
    FROM original_table
  ),
  forecast_table AS (
    SELECT 
      month_day,
      total_sales_forecast,
      total_sales_upper,
      total_sales_lower,
      NULL AS total_sales
    FROM AI_FORECAST(
      TABLE(original_table),
      horizon => (
        SELECT
          max_date_column + MAKE_DT_INTERVAL(CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(max_date_column, min_date_column) * 0.5) AS INT), 0, 0, 0)
        FROM dates
      ),
      time_col => 'month_day',
      value_col => 'total_sales'
    )
  )

  SELECT * FROM forecast_table
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    month_day,
    NULL AS total_sales_forecast,
    NULL AS total_sales_upper,
    NULL AS total_sales_lower,
    total_sales
  FROM original_table
    WHERE month_day < (SELECT max_date_column FROM dates)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    max_date_column AS month_day,
    total_sales AS total_sales_forecast,
    total_sales AS total_sales_upper,
    total_sales AS total_sales_lower,
    total_sales
  FROM
    dates

datasets.name: 50f7250f
datasets.displayName: Agg_1: Transactions, sales and quantity sold by store and month for 2023 (Forecasted)
queryLines:
WITH original_table AS (
    SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC("WEEK", `month_day`) AS month_day,
  AVG(`total_sales`) AS total_sales
FROM (
    SELECT 
  store_name,
  product_detail,
  make_date(year(transaction_date), month(transaction_date), day(transaction_date)) AS month_day,
  SUM(transaction_id) AS total_transactions,
  ROUND(sum(transation_total),2) AS total_sales,
  SUM(transaction_qty) AS total_quantity_sold

  fct_coffee_shop_transactions
LEFT JOIN dim_coffee_shop_stores

LEFT JOIN dim_coffee_products 
  ON fct_coffee_shop_transactions.product_id = dim_coffee_products.product_id
WHERE
  YEAR(transaction_date) = 2023
GROUP BY 
  store_name,
  product_detail,
  month_day
ORDER BY 
  store_name,
  month_day
) GROUP BY 1
  ),
  dates AS (
    SELECT 
      MAX(month_day) AS max_date_column,
      MIN(month_day) AS min_date_column,
      MAX_BY(total_sales, month_day) AS total_sales

  ),
  forecast_table AS (
    SELECT 
      month_day,
      total_sales_forecast,
      total_sales_upper,
      total_sales_lower,
      NULL AS total_sales
    FROM AI_FORECAST(
      TABLE(original_table),
      horizon => (
        SELECT
          max_date_column + MAKE_DT_INTERVAL(CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(max_date_column, min_date_column) * 0.5) AS INT), 0, 0, 0)
        FROM dates
      ),
      time_col => 'month_day',
      value_col => 'total_sales'
    )
  )

  SELECT * FROM forecast_table
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    month_day,
    NULL AS total_sales_forecast,
    NULL AS total_sales_upper,
    NULL AS total_sales_lower,
    total_sales
  FROM original_table
    WHERE month_day < (SELECT max_date_column FROM dates)

  SELECT
    max_date_column AS month_day,
    total_sales AS total_sales_forecast,
    total_sales AS total_sales_upper,
    total_sales AS total_sales_lower,
    total_sales
  FROM
    dates
